articles.author: Bryan Mena
articles.title: Americans are feeling much better about inflation - CNN
articles.description: Americans are feeling upbeat about inflation and the economy, according to the University of Michigan’s latest consumer survey released Friday.
articles.content:
Americans are feeling upbeat about inflation and the economy, according to the University of Michigans latest consumer survey released Friday.

articles.author: Sean Lyngaas
articles.title: Millions of Americans’ personal data exposed in global hack - CNN
articles.description: Millions of people in Louisiana and Oregon have had their data compromised in the sprawling cyberattack that has also hit the US federal government, state agencies said late Thursday.
articles.content:
